message: Let's split it evenly, Bob.  Fair is fair, right?
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll give you a little more this time.  But I'm not going to give away the farm, Bob.  This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm willing to bet you'll consider this one
Alright, Bob, I'm getting tired of this game.  Take your 6000 and let's be done with it.
